svg.content: <mxfile userAgent="Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/64.0.3282.186 Safari/537.36" version="8.3.5" editor="www.draw.io" type="google"><diagram id="46cb059f-3309-76c9-258c-fa93cf343e00" name="Top Level - Hardware Block"></diagram><diagram id="73b4ec22-4445-b71e-7e44-ca40e8189b99" name="Server/Consumer - Hardware"></diagram><diagram id="ee232195-2e14-9243-6b3e-54455560dd34" name="Pi3 - Hardware"></diagram><diagram id="7ea0743b-cce5-5a51-25c1-802fcef4917f" name="DataFlow - ALL"></diagram><diagram id="d76e6142-feae-9ea9-d43c-55639de2460d" name="Software Data Flow"></diagram></mxfile>

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 8px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 258px; white-space: nowrap; word-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 8px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 116px; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal; text-align: center;

div.div: Pi Cycles into high power mode after the low power cycle is complete.

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 116px; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal; text-align: right;

div.div: Pi 3 initiates data collection sequence, which involves initiating photo sequence and sensor readings from weather sensors, Camera, Battery Readings and Battery Box Temperature.

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 116px; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
div.div: Pi 3 performs image processing algorithm and creates a local cache of the that package of data.

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 17px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 148px; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal; font-weight: bold; text-align: center;
div.div: Pi 3 High Power Polling / Low Power mode

switch.text: Pi 3 High Power Polling / Low Power mode

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 176px; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
div.div: Web API call to the Azure Iot Hub to store the data for this device. The Iot hub will receive the data and pass it on to Azure Stream Analytics.

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 116px; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
div.div: Package up the raw data and image processing data results and make a WEB API call that has data for sensor readings, image proccessing results, Battery Level and Battery Box Temperature.

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 116px; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
div.div: PI3 makes a WEB API call to detect any configuration changes made since last polling. It applies theses changes to it .config file.

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 116px; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
div.div: The Azure Stream Analytics job will leverage our AI model built in the Azure Machine Learning workbench to generate some predictive data.

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 146px; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
div.div: The Stream Analytics job will then pass the predictive data to an Azure Blob storage module. This module will be easily accessible through a Web API for the App and Web Form.

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 176px; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
div.div: Pi 3 cycles into lower power mode shutting down all peripherals except the temperature sensor monitoring the battery temperature.

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 126px; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
div.div: Continuous monitoring of the temperature to ensure it does not reach unsafe temperature levels. On completion of low power cycle we will initiate the high power cycle.

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 146px; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
div.div: If the temperature reaches an unsafe level a WEB API call is made to send this warning information. The Pi3 will do an emergency shut down.
